articles.author: Emma Grimshaw, Steve Bagnall
articles.title: Michael Mosley's three foods to avoid if you want to shed the pounds - North Wales Live
articles.description: The health expert said one in particular 'could be to blame for the obesity crisis'
articles.content:
Dr Michael Mosley has shared three foods you should "avoid or minimise" if you want shed the pounds in weight.
 The health expert, who is famed for creating the 5:2 and the Fast 800 eating plans, ha… [+1612 chars]
